attributes.action: Make the enquiry into the causes of and all government actions leading up to the Iraq war to be held in public, with witnesses subpoenaed to testify on oath to an independent commission acceptable to all parties represented in Parliament.  And that this enquiry be charged with determining lessons learned as well as whether any laws were broken, this to be a precursor to the prosecution of anyone found to have broken the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am aggrieved that the Prime Minister, having soken so recently about 'transparency' chooses to make this most sensitive inquiry secret.  My perception, and I am far from alone in this, is that the terms of reference of the two previous enquiries were drawn so tightly that they served merely to protect those involved from the government.  As such they were a whitewash and not worthy of the title 'Inquiry'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
